title: Support Vector Machines
subtext: Finds the best boundary between classes in data.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Support Vector Machines
texts: Support Vector Machines (SVM) are a type of supervised learning algorithm used for classification and regression. They work by finding the best boundary that separates different classes of data points.
Imagine drawing a line that best divides two groups of points on a graph. SVM finds this optimal line.
